Featured Project

Baptist Health South Florida Proton Center

  • Next

Description

Baptist Health South Florida developed a new 320,000 SF Cancer Center and Research Building. Our proton project expanded the cancer center with 40,000 SF of proton modalities, which will establish the first major clinical program of its type in South Florida. Clinic facilities will serve all radiation treatment patients, both photon and proton. The proton vaults include three new full rotational gantries to complement the photon radiation services, which will contain six vaults, including Cyber Knife and Gamma Knife.

Project Highlights

  • Comprehensive cancer center
  • Three gantries (One dedicated to pediatric proton treatment)
  • Shared clinic and support space with photon radiation spaces
  • Tight site logistics for equipment installation
  • Coordinated with multiple contractors
  • Equipment vendor: IBA

3
